body:
Mahiru-channnnnnnnnnn~~~~~😍😍😍😍😍
Shuki Shuki SHUKIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII~~~~~😍😍😍😍😍😍😍
So Fuyuno started this whole mess because she wants her brother to pay attention to her and "discipline" her more? That's kinda sweet
This one shitty ending. What happened to the harem!? ffs
If this series ever comes out on FAKKU, I'll definitely buy it. Michiking is just fucking worth it
They married BUT she can only have sex with him if his in his Kotetsu form XD Michiking is one of, if not, the GREATEST shota doujin writer out there
is it possible to see more of fuyuno in the future?
i want more fuyuno scenes, she's best girl
Teipei got bad end tbh. No harem and wife only love Shota form, bruh
From the moment Fuyuno's motives are explained, I fully expected it to end with "after all that my onii-chan's dick is still better"
What the actual fuck

@Goji No, first of all Chiaki loved him even before the Older Sister Experience. There's no way she'd ditch him. As for Ayaka, you can see in the previous chapter that she calls him Onii-chan now. She also turns to him to discipline Fuyuno, so she must trust him a lot. Fuyuno was a little rebellious, but as you can see in this chapter, she has completely submitted to Shuntarou now. He definitely got the best ending.

As for Teppei, the current MC, his ending isn't as good. Fuyuno openly tells him that he wasn't good enough to win her over (after she fawns over Shuntarou) and that if he had been a little better he could've had his Onee-san harem. What happens to him after is pretty clear without explanation, I guess
Is this really gonna end with best girl hinamori getting fucked only 1 and a half times?!?!?!!? fuk off

So does this imply previous MC got ditched by his other two oneesans and only ends up with her? Either way this is kind of a neutral end. Not the sort of "good end" a lot following this were hoping for I think. MC openly being despised by his wife unless in shota form and his actual oneesan loving him in either way is a bit different I guess. Kind of wanted to see more of the oneesan than more of old MC, dude already got his own story and they blasted half the chapter basically driving home MC got a raw deal compared to the last work.
Very nice ending. Happy for everyone
Waiting for the English version
This ending LMAO
Previous mc(mc with glasses) went from weeb to ripped as fuck.

@Dayummm The glassed dude is Fuyuno's big brother from the prequel. He punishes her with a merciless dicking and she loves it (gets addicted to his punishments, she transfers out of the school soon after)
↓Aye thanks for explaining↓

He got engaged with the FMC, but his harem dumped him. Furthermore, she only let him fuck her in shota form, and still despised his adult form. Compare to the previous MC who was loved by his sister even in adult form, Teppei got the worst end.

And thus a legend had come to an end.

Not fair! I wanted to see the older sister in action as well!
@RYuujin    the first girl he had sex with while he's a shota .... black hair girl
@Im just here for the plot    ......................it's possible on e-hentai just set bounty for translations .. but this doujinshi is top it'll get translate asap don't worry ..
@Dayummm The glasses dude is the kid. He was just turned into a shota due to the power of that app from the prequel.
Who is the glasses dud?
Wow that ending... Married with 1 girl and happy with multiple
After all this time, it's done in 11 chapters? Kinda hope longer
Great series! Hope the last chapter gets translated
@Miyiu who did he marry?

I wish it was possible to contribute to a fund on each doujin to pay for a translation. I wouldn't mind giving a few bucks here and there for doujins from artists I'm found of. Once the capital has been raised, the money goes to the translator and the work gets posted here when it's ready. I think it could be relatively simply done.
For real keep shotacon until the end bruh
married best girl, good ending <3

It’s kinda insane how long this series has been going on for: A very satisfying end if I do so myself. I’m excited to see what masterpiece michiking delivers unto us next! Hopefully it has more Lolis :p
It's here..... translation pls
it is finally end.
